website_summaries.verdict: Huge media storage option that will accommodate even the largest collection.
pros: Offers dimensions of 56 by 51 inches, making it one of the largest media storage cabinets at this price point
More than a dozen adjustable shelves work with all sizes of media
Sharp looking color with cherry and black finish
High quality, Made in the USA product
cons: Backing board may not fit quite right, but it is needed for stability

customer_reviews.title: Good value for those of us with big CD libraries
customer_reviews.text: Sturdiness? Well, it is particleboard after all, but it isn't coarse and crumbly like some. Instructions were decent and easy to follow. Assembled product has a slight tendency to lean forward, but this was easily cured with the use of a shim. It sure holds a lot of CDs. Overall appearance doesn't suggest something cheap, either. Will most likely buy another as my music library expands. Good value overall.
customer_reviews.author: Ward Dorrity

customer_reviews.title: Great, Well Built Media Storage!
customer_reviews.text: Needed some extra space for my ever growing movie and game collection and this did just the thing. I have to say that it's easily the best storage unit I've ever had to build. The build was very simple and did not take much time. The frame is sturdy and the shelves feel like they're held in place very well. The only negative was that when I opened the box the backing for the shelf had some kind of white powder on it. Not sure if it was for packaging purposes or if it was from the particle board. Overall though I would definitely recommend this product and will be looking into another for myself in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan E.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice For The Money.
customer_reviews.text: The first one we received was damaged. Somehow the Styrofoam packing material got melted onto parts of the shelf. No problem. Amazon had it shipped back at no charge to us. The replacement was fine. The shelf went together very easily. Everything aligned well. We did use wood glue to help secure the dowel rods and the shelf backing. Which is nailed on using small brads. Once assembled it was very nice looking and sturdy. We consider it a good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Muchohombre

customer_reviews.title: Works for us!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this piece! My husband put it together relatively easily, and it looks better then expected for being assembled furniture. Suitable size for the moderate dvd collector( buy movies you like frequently, but not necessarily an actual collector). 2 together would probably still look ok, if you don't mind a wall of DVDs/ blu rays. Works great for our families needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lnewbie76

customer_reviews.title: ...enough room! I purchased this time three and first time I bought two. Fit Great!
customer_reviews.text: I' am closing in on (5) five thousand movies (Blu-ray!) In addition, I have three thousand regular (DVD's). I like the idea that so far I have enough room but will be looking for a place to store more DVD's and Blu-rays.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Universal use
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these from a garage sale and wanted another to match. I use them for my sport card collection and love the fit and look. Very sturdy and is universal for many storage needs. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Shorter shelves resist "bowing" - Excellent Design
customer_reviews.text: Very Well packaged - would withstand a very hard hit or drop. I would say there's very little risk in shipping damage. It went together very easily - What attracted me to this product was the center column support allowing for shorter shelves. they wont bow under heavy weights and haven't yet. (I don't expect them to) One word of advice - use the wall securing strap.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: The piece is sturdy but the shelves are adjustable to accommodate cd's rather ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for my massive movie collection. The piece is sturdy but the shelves are adjustable to accommodate cd's rather than blu rays or dvd's. If they had raised the height of the entire unit by only 2 inches it would be perfect for movies. Instead the bad height causes you have one row of shelving that can only hold cd's. Even blu rays won't fit on that row and it ends up becoming a waste of space. Just make it 2 inches taller!
customer_reviews.author: xLaXome

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Just got my cabinet,Roomier than expected and easier to put together than expected .... I would definitely recommend this for anyone who needs DVD storage space ... Also came with extra shelves and clips holders ... Don't be scared off by some of the Negative reviews !!!! Strongly recommend ............
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: WELL DESIGNED PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: THE UNIT IS STURDY AND STABLE ON HARD WOOD FLOOR, PROBABLY NOT AS GOOD ON CARPET. IT WAS NOT DIFFICULT TO PUT TOGETHER, ALTHOUGH TACKING ON THE BACK IS A LITTLE TRICKY. I AM VERY PLEASED WITH MY PURCHASE, IT IS THE SECOND ONE I'VE BOUGHT.
customer_reviews.author: william roland herzel

customer_reviews.title: I love how these look and they do exactly what I ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had no problems with this. Everything came in the package (except tools) My husband and I put the first one together in about an hour b/c of reading instruction and everything. The first one did not fit all of our dvds so we bought another one. Arrived fast. We put the second one together in 25 mins. I love how these look and they do exactly what I need them to do.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Yoch

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What You Expect, If You Expect Good Things
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf! It took some time and more than one person to get together, but it was not necessarily difficult. Once against the wall, it looks clean and even like a quality piece of furniture. Despite being made of pulp wood or particle board or whatever it is called, it seems solid and has given me absolutely no trouble. I have put hardcover books, paper backs, single-contained trilogies and digipak CDs on the shelf with no problem, in function or cosmetically. Recommended. (I may get a second!)
customer_reviews.author: Selrisitai

customer_reviews.title: GREAT storage solution for us
customer_reviews.text: We recently moved and realized that our media bookcases were too tall for the space we have, so we purchased two triple media towers. They not only look great and fit perfectly, they hold 90% of our DVDs and VHS tapes (yes, we still watch those...call us old school). They come with quite a few movable shelves to accommodate many kinds of media. If we had enough space we'd get another one. The quality is very good for the price and they seem to be more solidly made than some other ones we looked at. I'd recommend this unit to anyone who needs a lot of storage for their collection.
customer_reviews.author: malfoyfan

customer_reviews.title: We love these!
customer_reviews.text: We love these. We got 2 and lined the wall in my office with them. They are perfect size for what we need. Easy to put together, very nice looking too. We get compliments all the time and they are great for a massive DVD collection. One of the best investments we have made for home furniture (And they look classy - not crazy and unorganized like our previous DVD cases). Plus, there is room on the bottom shelf for my books. Since the shelves are adjustable, it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lover BLB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Sturdy, looks great, plenty of extra shelves and totally customizable. Cons: No matter how you space the shelves, you can't perfectly align dvd's down the whole thing - you'll either have an awkward extra tall shelf at the top or a cd-sized shelf at the bottom. Blu-rays run into a similar issue, basically you can't fill it from top to bottom with any single type of movie (dvd or blu ray). No worries though, we put cd's on the very bottom shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Nice product and great packaging
customer_reviews.text: Product came extremely well packaged and assembly was the normal very easy. The only downside so far is the glue/particleboard smell. It’s been unpacked for two weeks and it still stinks. I hope that this goes away. Almost took a star away for the smell.
customer_reviews.author: gordon d blank

customer_reviews.title: Great storage option for large collections
customer_reviews.text: I have a growing media collection that sits right around 400 DVD/Bluray titles. With this media storage shelf I was able to keep them together with room to spare. The product came in a timely manner and the only item with a scratch on it was an item that I think was put in the box to keep things from shifting during shipping as it is not needed. Assembly took less than 30 minutes with a screw driver and a hammer. I agree with others, I wish the back was one piece but its not that big of a deal. I would recommend this for anyone with a large collection.
customer_reviews.author: MetalFan

customer_reviews.title: I hate trying to get the back panels lined up so ...
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I don't care about with this, and most do it yourself furniture, is the backing. I hate trying to get the back panels lined up so all the nails go into the center part of the wood and not causing the wood to split or splinter. If I was to do another one, I would use a furring strip where the back panels go against each other. This is why I didn't give it 5 stars. Others have mentioned they didn't like how the shelves were not colored on the bottom and they painted them. Total waste of time IMHO since you can't see the bottoms anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Thumpernator

customer_reviews.title: This was easy to put together and the base at the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together and the base at the bottom keeps it from tilting forward. I got this to store clay and mason jars with lots of small fiddlely bits in them, It stored everything beautifully. I took 1 star off because it had a couple of deep scratches on the front that I couldn't hide. It didn't stop it from being able to do what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Dancing Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Love it 💙
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shelf . It was very easy to assemble with well given instructions. It is not as bulky as some shelves can be so it allowed the room to look more open . We like the shelve so much we ordered a second . It was everything we was hoping it would be .
customer_reviews.author: Megan Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sturdy shelfs for a large collection. I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it has a securing strap that allows you to attach this shelf to the wall eliminating the risk of the shelf being knocked over. It was a little difficult to attach the rear panels without x Ray vision but I managed using a tape measure
customer_reviews.author: geo

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Holds our CD's and DVD's, assembled fairly easily, sturdy on a tile floor. Ordered the 3 column and the 2 column and they matched well, sit side by side.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn R. Berg

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf for DVDs
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shelf for the price. Holds a lot of DVDs. Fairly easy to put together, except the back. The back is just a sturdy cardboard that you have to nail in. So...if you're not super great with a hammer, this can be a bit challenging. Once put together, the shelf is sturdy and looks very nice. The cherry finish is a true cherry finish, not walnut or oak like some other furniture I have bought on-line.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not wood.  More wood product. Adequate for laser media.
customer_reviews.text: Veneer on manufactured wood, not wood. Not sure it's worth the asking price. Appearance is decent. It's sturdy enough for dvds and the like. It's not sturdy enough for books or somewhat heavy things. If moving, I'd treat it like a mirror. Room for five rows of dvds and one row of cds.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence A. Free

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: Huge amount of storage and nice looking too. Typical assembly required. It has a zip-tie type wall anchor that I at first chose not to use, but once we loaded it up we realized the necessity- it felt rather unstable. With the wall anchor, though- it's fine. Lots of easily adjustable shelves too, so you can customize according to how many cd's or dvd's you have. I thought it was a great value considering the amount of storage it has.
customer_reviews.author: Llayne

customer_reviews.title: Looks Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to put together and very sturdy. There’s ton of room and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Rusty B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this media center reasonably priced for all that it carries, but it also looks good when it's put together. If I have any complaints at all it's that I wish pen marks would have been drawn onto the board that you nail onto the back of the center (and for that matter, on the back of the center itself) so you'd know where to nail it in at exactly (I accidentally punched through the board three times cause I set the one side off a little too far). Other than that small complaint, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Zapiggy

customer_reviews.title: Good value, and lots of storage space
customer_reviews.text: This unit seems to be well made, but the cardboard back was a little tricky to line up and nail in place. The shelves are not too wide, so you won't have to worry about sagging shelves. I used shims under the front of the unit, and it is very sturdy now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Product description has errors and missing information
customer_reviews.text: Only issues I found were in the description of the product, Product description needed to include dimensions. I would have chosen a larger/taller model. Again in the description, it stated fully adjustable shelves for all media types. I consolidated 3 smaller units, however, the unit does not hold all of my DVDs in an upright manor. Each section has one shelf that isn't tall enough to accommodate the DVDs so I had to lay them down, defeating the purpose for creating extra space for more DVDs. Other than the above mentioned issues, I've gotten several compliments on the unit. Looks great in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Trowbridge

customer_reviews.title: Cheap construction.
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping for quality equal to Sauder products. Sadly, this did not live up to my expectations. The back panels don't line up properly with the boards to nail onto. Ended up with nails sticking outside the boards. Not the best construction. But we'll see how long it lasts
customer_reviews.author: Richard S

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fast shipping. Exactly what I ordered. Took me about 2 hours to put together, but excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and holds lots of CDs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, clear instructions, good hardware, configurable, sturdy, looks good, holds lots of CDs. If you use all the shelves, it has 24 sections, which makes it easier to categorize your CDs. I'll buy another one if ever I get ambitious enough to reorganize.
customer_reviews.author: tinab

customer_reviews.title: I have to say it is a very nice finish. And when its all tightened together and ...
customer_reviews.text: Its exactly how described. It is the pressed board with the cherry outside. I have to say it is a very nice finish. And when its all tightened together and secured to the wal it is quite sturdy and durable feeling. And many many options with the shelving placements. I dont even know how many dvd and blurays i have but its alot and this shelve is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: For particle lumber construction this is still a good choice. With its ease of construction
customer_reviews.text: For particle lumber construction this is still a good choice. With its ease of construction, high DVD capacity, decent looks, and excellent packaging I would have no problems buying this product again. You will need some damp wash rags and a vacuum cleaner or broom and dustpan as there is a lot of sawdust on the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: This piece looks fantastic and was not difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This piece looks fantastic and was not difficult to assemble, I filled it completely the first day and was looking for a shorter narrower version that was as reasonable, but alas none. Settled for an all back DVD/CD holder, not as appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin W Krieger

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says. Says what it does.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived before scheduled date. H-E-A-V-Y. Do not try to assemble alone. :) Have all my media in one spot now. The back is really tough to line up and nail into place. Thinking I may switch from the included nails to a staple gun and Gorilla tape. And some of the holes for the adjustable shelves aren't bored wide enough for the pins. Hammer to get in, pliers to get out.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Foor

customer_reviews.title: My husband like them so much he wanted to keep them both
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, by accident. My husband like them so much he wanted to keep them both! They were easy to assembl. They really look nice?
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time and in good condition. It matched description. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brice Moeller

customer_reviews.title: Looks very good and works well
customer_reviews.text: The unit looks very nice - the black and cherry finishes work well together. It is very sturdy. The assembly instructions were quite easy to follow and the process was not difficult even though I had to do it alone. Just be sure that you have a good bit of open space for the process because this a fairly large shelving unit.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Audin

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find and doesn't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I had such a hard time finding something large enough to hold his entire collection. I was certain this would wind up disappointing somehow. Not the case! Terrific value and easy to assemble. (Only puzzlement was an extra 3" x 4' board.)
customer_reviews.author: R. Reed

customer_reviews.title: the backing can't be added on till after all your ...
customer_reviews.text: the backing can't be added on till after all your media is stored . The backing won't allow media to store correctly unless you put the backing on ;ast :(
customer_reviews.author: Janet Taft

customer_reviews.title: Organized at last
customer_reviews.text: Well built, I managed to get all 500+ movies on there mixed dvd and BR with room left for more. It was easy to assemble except for the backing, trying to line it up with the sides and then the nails the send with it are good for hanging small pictures so I had to improvise a little. Great product, I might have to get another as my collection grows.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Walker

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. A bit of a pain to nail the ...
customer_reviews.text: Has been holding up well. Looks good. A bit of a pain to nail the back on. Use two people or you likely will make mistakes.
customer_reviews.author: P. F. Recupero

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of furniture.  Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Not too difficult to put together. Just a bit time consuming. I agree with others that there has to be a way of improving the back so that it wouldn't be so difficult to attach. Nice looking piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Manning

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas because she liked the DVD rack in my house. It was a little smaller than I thought but when she assembled it, it fit well in her front room. I warned my daughter to follow the instructions carefully when putting it together, she did and It was easy to put together and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lynn Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It holds a lot of stuff and doesn’t look clunky.
customer_reviews.author: Nesha

customer_reviews.title: Good cabinet, but is top heavy
customer_reviews.text: Good cabinet, but is top heavy. Easy to put together and you can easily brace the cabinet to over come it being top heavy. Don't have it full yet, but it will easily hold the amount of DVD's it is said to hold. Solid construction. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: William C.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Storage for DVDs etc.
customer_reviews.text: These hold a lot of DVDs, CDs and games. Those shelves are adjustable depending on your needs and sizes of DVDs etc. I owned one of these and loved it so much that I ordered this second one. Wish I could have matched the color in my other other one but they still look very nice and are so functional.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A Dahlin

customer_reviews.title: Great for media storage
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive media storage unit. It was easy to put together and holds lots of dvds.
customer_reviews.author: roadrunner808

customer_reviews.title: perfect for paperbacks as well as DVDs and CDs and ...
customer_reviews.text: perfect for paperbacks as well as DVDs and CDs and games. looks high quality. only had to put a strip of cardboard under bottom to steady it against the wall. have now ordered the Media wall mounts to match to put above this.
customer_reviews.author: Jan WellsMinzel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble (my girlfriend did it before I had even gotten home) and is fairly strong enough. I does seem to hold as many DVD's as it claims as my collection is over 400. The one critique I have of it is that if you look closely at the pic you will see that the top shelves hold CD's. I have not yet found an arrangement where the shelving can be arranged to hold DVD/BluRay without laying some down which is a pet peeve of mine. They did include several sextra shelves and construction pieces for you to choose the shelf arrangement on your own. Overall, I would say I like this very much.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Good quality. Hard to nail the back on evenly but that was due to the size.
customer_reviews.author: d.newm

customer_reviews.title: A great shelf that fits my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a shelf that fits my needs as a a movie collector, and this more than fit my needs. It was easy to assemble, and I got it up and filled in no time flat. A great item, that was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Angelique

customer_reviews.title: very nice !
customer_reviews.text: wish it was bigger I will be getting another one !
customer_reviews.author: sharol l roll

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Looks better than some more expensive shelves. Assembly went well, putting the back on takes some positioning.
customer_reviews.author: B. W. Goff

customer_reviews.title: A huge amount of space to store CDs.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. If you have a lot of CDs, this will help you get them organized. The only downside for me was the challenge of finding a spot in my music room where it wouldn't cover an outlet. You'd like to be able to put a light on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: JJB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble - Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought, but nice kit that was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly sturdy and durable. It won't feel that way when you're putting it together though.
customer_reviews.author: Jerlayne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Media Storage solution.
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly and clear instructions. The appearance of this unit is really nice, Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Badum

customer_reviews.title: Not as stable as I would like, but easy to set up ( I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as stable as I would like, but easy to set up ( I was able to build it by myself) and change the shelf lengths as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Savino

customer_reviews.title: Functional Furniture that Looks Good!
customer_reviews.text: A great piece of functional furniture that looks good against the wall......is not obtrusive at all! The package was shipped on time and in tact. With a little patience construction went simply and smoothly. Love the handsome way the shelving presents my collection of CDs!
customer_reviews.author: the monrovian bear

customer_reviews.title: holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. easy to put together and it holds a lot of home made DVD's in cd cases. It's a bit pricey for what it really is and the oak unit is $50 less, but i needed a cherry one.
customer_reviews.author: anthoneyc

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS GOOD YOU WILL NEED A STAPLER TO SECURE THE BACK ...
customer_reviews.text: LOOKS GOOD YOU WILL NEED A STAPLER TO SECURE THE BACK PANEL FORWARNED
customer_reviews.author: JOEYVEL

customer_reviews.title: looked like a bottom foot for across the front
customer_reviews.text: no safety harness was included and there was an extra piece.... looked like a bottom foot for across the front, but this didn't need one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephannie McGuire

customer_reviews.title: I Love this storage rack
customer_reviews.text: I Love this storage rack. Easily assembled, attractive, sturdy and really holds a lot of cds or dvds. Easy to configure shelving to accomodate your needs. If you need a storage rack at a reasonable price, then this is the one to go for!
customer_reviews.author: Richaard Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good shelf for the price.
customer_reviews.text: As a cd, dvd, vhs shelf this is a nice unit. Would have preferred oak instead of cherry but still nice.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck5055

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super Item Works great don't have to have all those small one. been looking for one a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This shelf was BARELY big enough for all of my ...
customer_reviews.text: This shelf was BARELY big enough for all of my DVD & Blu-Ray titles. That's rather impressive considering how massive my collection is...
customer_reviews.author: Captain Kirk

customer_reviews.title: You Pay for what you get... Had ...
customer_reviews.text: You Pay for what you get... Had to return this product as the holes didn't align properly and the material was Lesser Quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the color and all the DVD's it can hold.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: ... that I purchased from Amazon with 5 stars was excellent thank you
customer_reviews.text: Everything that I purchased from Amazon with 5 stars was excellent thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: need space to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot of dvd's and is pretty stable but, backer board installation is somewhat tedious ( tiny nails that must be angled at center joint are somewhat of a pain but not a deal breaker, need a good amount of room as you must lay it flat to install backer board.)
customer_reviews.author: michael r. cloaninger

customer_reviews.title: Quite pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected; better than average quality for this type of material. Assembly is what was expected, looks good when complete.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With Product
customer_reviews.text: The shelf is very sturdy i was really surprised. Assembly was very easy and it looks great. I will be buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: aries316

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture and is Very easy to assemble. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made for the price! We bought another one two days later for the rest of our dvds!
customer_reviews.author: boomer

customer_reviews.title: excellent product for music and movie collectors!!
customer_reviews.text: I emptied four floor racks and a cabinet and this held it all and I still have room for more!!
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS L. VOSBURG

customer_reviews.title: Can not find these in our local stores anymore. ...
customer_reviews.text: Can not find these in our local stores anymore. It is just what I needed to store all my dics!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence E. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great storage option for DVDs/CDs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this larger version with the smaller one double width one. Great storage option for DVDs/CDs. Easy to assemble and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nina B.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and practical. Relatively easy to assemble but the box is extremely heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This unit is great to store your DVD or blue ray I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to put together. It is exactly what I was needing to hold my large cd collection, DVDs and VCR tapes. It is very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie

customer_reviews.title: great dvd storage
customer_reviews.text: The media shelf is great for Dvd and bluray storage.It seems to be sturdy.it looks fine.it gives me plenty of room for additional storage.The shelf width and height are perfect.The only reason I gave it only four stars was that one piece was not predrilled.Other than that the assembly was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal C

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking and Easy to Put Together!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was not too difficult to put together and looks great in my living room. Recommend to anyone else looking for a great way to organize and display their movies/cd's/books!
customer_reviews.author: JEdse

customer_reviews.title: Be careful,  you may not get the color you want
customer_reviews.text: Received the oak color instead of cherry, and with how heavy the thing is and how long it took to get it in the first place of course I'm not going to return it. Other than that, it seems to be a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of storage
customer_reviews.text: Great stand and easy to asseble. Be careful not to nick the base because the black paint comes off easy.
customer_reviews.author: Leon G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelving unit
customer_reviews.text: I do enjoy this shelf. I use it as a room divider as it's as long as the width of my bed frame and I can prop it up against it. The only disappointments I have is that the back is a thin piece of particle board and it's a bit top heavy. I've had to build my collection from the bottom up. Not a deal breaker in the slightest though.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hoshino

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: These came and while they required a little assembly they work perfect for our DVD and CD storage, we ordered two of them. I have seen these from the manufacturer and loved this color the best. Narrow enough to not stick out as far as a bookcase and is just the right height. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hasan

customer_reviews.title: cd storage
customer_reviews.text: This item is just what i needed! Putting it together was easy! It looks nice! Im very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: robert nicholas harp

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty much as expected
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty much as expected, assembly was straight forward, materials were decent, except the backing is a bit flimsy, and a little hard to line up.
customer_reviews.author: Zachg76

customer_reviews.title: Great Media Storage
customer_reviews.text: This is a great storage unit. It was very easy to put together, it looks great, it looks like we paid a lot more for it than we did. I highly recommend this unit for anyone that needs a nice looking storage solution for their media.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: wrapped all my fabric (fat quarters) now i can see all the fabric I have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customersamsons girlfriend

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this Shelf! Probably going to get another in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Great value, nice looking
customer_reviews.text: It shipped fast, was easy to put together and looks great in my living room. The adjustable shelves allowed me to incorporate both my Blue Rays and DVDs for ample storage.
customer_reviews.author: A. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Super Buy
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this. Easy to assemble. Looks great. Not too light or too heavy. Does not take up too much room. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Lang

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This stand is very sturdy and I love it. I may have to get another one to hold all of my movies, though!
customer_reviews.author: Betty Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it just wished all my movies fit, didn't know i had that many
customer_reviews.author: Jun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: holds approx 1800 cd's. decent construction. have help when assembling.
customer_reviews.author: michael withers

customer_reviews.title: very glad to have it
customer_reviews.text: I'm revising my previous review of this in which I wrote about being frustrated while putting this together. I eventually did manage to get it together and it is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for my collection!
customer_reviews.text: Very good material. Easy to build. The black and cherry wood looks great! Great for blu ray and ps3 storage.
customer_reviews.author: Dax

product_meta.title: Prepac Triple Width Wall Storage Cabinet, Cherry and Black
product_meta.description: This very popular "library style" media storage unit with three separate compartments is designed to accommodate any combination of media in a large collection. Fully adjustable shelves and horizontal media storage allows for easy sorting, filing and re-filing of your collection as it grows. Tops and bases are made of profiled MDF and bases are enlarged for extra stability.
feature_bullets: Finished in durable warm cherry and deep black laminate with a sturdy MDF backer
Adjustable shelves hold a variety of media sizes
Capacity: 960 CDs, 405 DVDs, 720 Blu-Ray discs, 240 VHS cassettes or any combination thereof
Dimensions: 56 W x 51 H x 8.75 D inches
Easy to install hanging rail system & an instruction booklet for easy assembly is included
5-year limited warranty on parts; Made in USA

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars206 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
